amendment.description: To prohibit funds to be made available to promote the sale or export of tobacco or tobacco products.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2092 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2092 proposed by Senator Bennett for Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S14005-14006; text: CR S14005) To prohibit funds to be made available to promote the sale or export of tobacco or tobacco products.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2092 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2092 proposed by Senator Bennett for Senator Durbin.
